audit_notes: 2026-01-29: Cabin-by-cabin verification via CruiseDeckPlans. Deck 8 lifeboat obstructions, bathtub removals verified.
methodology: Individual cabin verification via cruisedeckplans.com stateroom-details lookup. 404 responses indicate non-existent cabins.
trust_note: Verified via CruiseDeckPlans individual cabin lookups. Jewel class ship with Haven suites.

exceptions.notes: Deck 8 handicap-accessible oceanview cabins with 100% obstructed views due to lifeboats. Some have frosted windows that cannot be looked through.
Category OK and OX cabins may have frosted windows that cannot be looked through, in addition to lifeboat obstruction
Penthouse suites no longer have bathtubs after December 22, 2021 refurbishment
Club Suites (Mini-Suites) no longer have bathtubs after December 22, 2021 refurbishment

category_overrides._verification_note: Cabin categories verified via individual page lookups. Jewel class ship.
